title: Golden Gate National Recreation Area: Resources
body: Explore This Park    Get Involved     Sustainability     Resources              Sustainability Resources       Sustainability Newsletters  Vol.1 Spring 2015 Vol.2 Fall 2015  Transportation   Bike safety tips from the San Francisco Bicycle Coalition  Bay Area bike share program  Trip plan with 511  Water   Water saving tips from Marin Municipal Water District  CA water rebates EPA WaterSense products  Waste  U.S. Environmental Protection Agency's waste page San Francisco Department of the Environment Where to recycle items Tips on reducing the waste stream from stopwaste.org   Green products   Sort out green advertising claims  Green Seal standards Green building tips GreenGuard certification EPEAT's greener electronics EcoLogo certified products Green products and services from the SF Approved List
